archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1166
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Vodafone Foundation manager, I want to be able to identify partner accounts/recipients in the DX system

properties.value: PIM: How link between partner and related accounts is managed? Is this simply Partners account of accounts of some other customers Foundation Manager = Vodafone product owner

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
